zikr: الْحَمْدُ للَّهِ الَّذِي أَحْيَانَا بَعْدَ مَا أَمَاتَنَا وَإِلَيْهِ النُّشُورُ
translation: All praise is for Allah who gave us life after having taken it from us and unto Him is the resurrection.
transliteration: Alhamdu lillahil-ladhi ahyana ba'da ma amatana wa ilayhin-nushur.
description: First dua upon waking up from sleep
benefits: Gratitude for life and acknowledging the Day of Resurrection

zikr: الْحَمْدُ للَّهِ الَّذِي كَسَانِي هَذَا وَرَزَقَنِيهِ مِنْ غَيْرِ حَوْلٍ مِنِّي وَلَا قُوَّةٍ
translation: All praise is for Allah who has clothed me with this garment and provided it for me, with no power or might from myself.
transliteration: Alhamdu lillahil-ladhi kasani hadha wa razaqanihi min ghayri hawlin minni wa la quwwah.
benefits: Past sins are forgiven

zikr: اللَّهُمَّ لَكَ الْحَمْدُ أَنْتَ كَسَوْتَنِيهِ، أَسْأَلُكَ مِنْ خَيْرِهِ وَخَيْرِ مَا صُنِعَ لَهُ، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّهِ وَشَرِّ مَا صُنِعَ لَهُ
translation: O Allah, for You is all praise, You have clothed me with it. I ask You for its goodness and the goodness of what it was made for, and I seek refuge with You from the evil of it and the evil of what it was made for.
transliteration: Allahumma lakal-hamdu anta kasawtanihi, as'aluka min khayrihi wa khayri ma suni'a lahu, wa a'udhu bika min sharrihi wa sharri ma suni'a lahu.
benefits: Seeking goodness and protection from any harm related to the garment

zikr: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْخُبْثِ وَالْخَبَائِثِ
translation: O Allah, I seek refuge with You from all evil and evil-doers (or male and female devils).
transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika minal-khubthi wal-khaba'ith.
benefits: Protection from evil spirits and jinn

zikr: غُفْرَانَكَ
translation: I ask You for Your forgiveness.
transliteration: Ghufranaka.
benefits: Seeking Allah's forgiveness

zikr: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ
translation: In the name of Allah.
transliteration: Bismillah.
benefits: Blessings in the act of purification

zikr: أَشْهَدُ أَنْ لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ، وَأَشْهَدُ أَنَّ مُحَمَّداً عَبْدُهُ وَرَسُولُهُ
translation: I bear witness that none has the right to be worshipped except Allah, alone without partner, and I bear witness that Muhammad is His slave and Messenger.
transliteration: Ashhadu an la ilaha illallahu wahdahu la sharika lah, wa ashhadu anna Muhammadan 'abduhu wa rasuluh.
benefits: The eight gates of Paradise are opened, enter from whichever you wish

zikr: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ، تَوَكَّلْتُ عَلَى اللَّهِ، وَلَا حَوْلَ وَلَا قُوَّةَ إِلَّا بِاللَّهِ
translation: In the name of Allah, I place my trust in Allah, and there is no might nor power except with Allah.
transliteration: Bismillah, tawakkaltu 'alallah, wa la hawla wa la quwwata illa billah.
benefits: You will be told: You are guided, defended and protected. The devils will go far from you

zikr: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ وَلَجْنَا، وَبِسْمِ اللَّهِ خَرَجْنَا، وَعَلَى اللَّهِ رَبِّنَا تَوَكَّلْنَا
translation: In the name of Allah we enter and in the name of Allah we leave, and upon our Lord we place our trust.
transliteration: Bismillahi walajna, wa bismillahi kharajna, wa 'alallahi rabbina tawakkalna.
benefits: Protection for the household and keeping Shaytan away

zikr: اللَّهُمَّ اجْعَلْ فِي قَلْبِي نُوراً، وَفِي لِسَانِي نُوراً، وَاجْعَلْ فِي سَمْعِي نُوراً، وَاجْعَلْ فِي بَصَرِي نُوراً، وَاجْعَلْ مِنْ خَلْفِي نُوراً، وَمِنْ أَمَامِي نُوراً، وَاجْعَلْ مِنْ فَوْقِي نُوراً، وَمِنْ تَحْتِي نُوراً، اللَّهُمَّ أَعْطِنِي نُوراً
translation: O Allah, place light in my heart, and on my tongue light, and in my ears light and in my sight light, and above me light, and below me light, and to my right light, and to my left light, and before me light and behind me light. Place in my soul light. Magnify for me light, and amplify for me light. Make for me light and make me a light. O Allah, grant me light, and place light in my nerves, and in my body light and in my blood light and in my hair light and in my skin light.
transliteration: Allahumma-j'al fi qalbi nuran, wa fi lisani nuran, wa-j'al fi sam'i nuran, wa-j'al fi basari nuran, wa-j'al min khalfi nuran, wa min amami nuran, wa-j'al min fawqi nuran, wa min tahti nuran. Allahumma a'tini nuran.
benefits: Spiritual light and guidance

zikr: أَعُوذُ بِاللَّهِ الْعَظِيمِ، وَبِوَجْهِهِ الْكَرِيمِ، وَسُلْطَانِهِ الْقَدِيمِ، مِنَ الشَّيْطَانِ الرَّجِيمِ
translation: I seek refuge in Allah the Mighty, in His Noble Face, and His Eternal Dominion from Satan the accursed.
transliteration: A'udhu billahil-'azim, wa bi-wajhihil-karim, wa sultanihil-qadim, minash-shaytanir-rajim.
benefits: Satan says: He is protected from me for the whole day

zikr: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ، وَالصَّلاَةُ وَالسَّلاَمُ عَلَى رَسُولِ اللَّهِ، اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ مِنْ فَضْلِكَ، اللَّهُمَّ اعْصِمْنِي مِنَ الشَّيْطَانِ الرَّجِيمِ
translation: In the name of Allah, and prayers and peace be upon the Messenger of Allah. O Allah, I ask You from Your favour. O Allah, guard me from the accursed devil.
transliteration: Bismillah, was-salatu was-salamu 'ala rasulillah. Allahumma inni as'aluka min fadlik. Allahumma-'simni minash-shaytanir-rajim.
benefits: Seeking Allah's favour and protection from Shaytan

zikr: اللَّهُمَّ رَبَّ هَذِهِ الدَّعْوَةِ التَّامَّةِ وَالصَّلاَةِ الْقَائِمَةِ آتِ مُحَمَّداً الْوَسِيلَةَ وَالْفَضِيلَةَ وَابْعَثْهُ مَقَاماً مَحْمُوداً الَّذِي وَعَدْتَهُ
translation: O Allah, Owner of this perfect call and Owner of this prayer to be performed, grant Muhammad al-waseelah and al-fadeelah and raise him up to a praised station which You have promised him.
transliteration: Allahumma rabba hadhihid-da'watit-tammah, was-salatil-qa'imah, ati Muhammadan al-wasilata wal-fadilah, wab'ath-hu maqaman mahmudanil-ladhi wa'adtah.
benefits: Prophet's intercession guaranteed on Day of Resurrection

zikr: سُبْحَانَكَ اللَّهُمَّ وَبِحَمْدِكَ، وَتَبَارَكَ اسْمُكَ، وَتَعَالَى جَدُّكَ، وَلَا إِلَهَ غَيْرُكَ
translation: Glory is to You O Allah, and praise. Blessed is Your Name and Exalted is Your Majesty. There is none worthy of worship except You.
transliteration: Subhanaka Allahumma wa bihamdika, wa tabarakasmuka, wa ta'ala jadduka, wa la ilaha ghayruk.
description: Opening supplication after starting prayer (after Takbir)
benefits: Praising Allah at the start of prayer

zikr: سُبْحَانَ رَبِّيَ الْعَظِيمِ
translation: Glory is to my Lord, the Most Great.
transliteration: Subhana rabbiyal-'azim.
reference: Abu Dawud, Ibn Majah, An-Nasa'i, At-Tirmidhi
benefits: Glorifying Allah during prayer

zikr: سَمِعَ اللَّهُ لِمَنْ حَمِدَهُ
translation: Allah hears whoever praises Him.
transliteration: Sami'allahu liman hamidah.
benefits: Acknowledging Allah hears our praise

zikr: رَبَّنَا وَلَكَ الْحَمْدُ حَمْداً كَثِيراً طَيِّباً مُبَارَكاً فِيهِ
translation: Our Lord, to You is all praise, an abundant beautiful blessed praise.
transliteration: Rabbana wa lakal-hamd, hamdan kathiran tayyiban mubarakan fih.
description: After rising from bowing, while standing
benefits: Praising Allah abundantly

zikr: سُبْحَانَ رَبِّيَ الْأَعْلَى
translation: Glory is to my Lord, the Most High.
transliteration: Subhana rabbiyal-a'la.
reference: Abu Dawud, Ibn Majah, An-Nasa'i, At-Tirmidhi
benefits: Glorifying Allah in the humblest position

zikr: رَبِّ اغْفِرْ لِي، رَبِّ اغْفِرْ لِي
translation: My Lord, forgive me. My Lord, forgive me.
transliteration: Rabbi-ghfir li, Rabbi-ghfir li.
description: Between the two prostrations while sitting
benefits: Seeking forgiveness from Allah

zikr: سَجَدَ وَجْهِي لِلَّذِي خَلَقَهُ وَشَقَّ سَمْعَهُ وَبَصَرَهُ بِحَوْلِهِ وَقُوَّتِهِ
translation: My face has prostrated to the One Who created it, and brought forth its hearing and sight by His might and power.
transliteration: Sajada wajhi lillathi khalaqahu wa shaqqa sam'ahu wa basarahu bihawlihi wa quwwatihi.
benefits: Humility and submission to Allah

zikr: التَّحِيَّاتُ للَّهِ وَالصَّلَوَاتُ وَالطَّيِّبَاتُ، السَّلَامُ عَلَيْكَ أَيُّهَا النَّبِيُّ وَرَحْمَةُ اللَّهِ وَبَرَكَاتُهُ، السَّلَامُ عَلَيْنَا وَعَلَى عِبَادِ اللَّهِ الصَّالِحِينَ، أَشْهَدُ أَنْ لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ، وَأَشْهَدُ أَنَّ مُحَمَّداً عَبْدُهُ وَرَسُولُهُ
translation: All compliments, prayers and pure words are due to Allah. Peace be upon you, O Prophet, and the mercy of Allah and His blessings. Peace be upon us and upon the righteous slaves of Allah. I bear witness that none has the right to be worshipped except Allah, and I bear witness that Muhammad is His slave and Messenger.
transliteration: At-tahiyyatu lillahi was-salawatu wat-tayyibat, as-salamu 'alayka ayyuhan-nabiyyu wa rahmatullahi wa barakatuh, as-salamu 'alayna wa 'ala 'ibadillahis-salihin, ashhadu an la ilaha illallah, wa ashhadu anna Muhammadan 'abduhu wa rasuluh.
benefits: Greeting and blessings upon the Prophet

zikr: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ وَعَلَى آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ كَمَا صَلَّيْتَ عَلَى إِبْرَاهِيمَ وَعَلَى آلِ إِبْرَاهِيمَ إِنَّكَ حَمِيدٌ مَجِيدٌ، اللَّهُمَّ بَارِكْ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ وَعَلَى آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ كَمَا بَارَكْتَ عَلَى إِبْرَاهِيمَ وَعَلَى آلِ إِبْرَاهِيمَ إِنَّكَ حَمِيدٌ مَجِيدٌ
translation: O Allah, send prayers upon Muhammad and upon the family of Muhammad, just as You sent prayers upon Ibrahim and upon the family of Ibrahim. Verily, You are full of Praise and Majesty. O Allah, send blessings upon Muhammad and upon the family of Muhammad, just as You sent blessings upon Ibrahim and upon the family of Ibrahim. Verily, You are full of Praise and Majesty.
transliteration: Allahumma salli 'ala Muhammadin wa 'ala ali Muhammad, kama sallayta 'ala Ibrahima wa 'ala ali Ibrahim, innaka hamidun majid. Allahumma barik 'ala Muhammadin wa 'ala ali Muhammad, kama barakta 'ala Ibrahima wa 'ala ali Ibrahim, innaka hamidun majid.
description: Sending blessings on Prophet after Tashahhud
benefits: Following the command to send salawat on the Prophet

zikr: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ عَذَابِ جَهَنَّمَ، وَمِنْ عَذَابِ الْقَبْرِ، وَمِنْ فِتْنَةِ الْمَحْيَا وَالْمَمَاتِ، وَمِنْ شَرِّ فِتْنَةِ الْمَسِيحِ الدَّجَّالِ
translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the punishment of Hell, from the punishment of the grave, from the trials of life and death, and from the evil of the trial of the False Messiah.
transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika min 'adhabi jahannama, wa min 'adhabil-qabr, wa min fitnatil-mahya wal-mamat, wa min sharri fitnatil-masihid-dajjal.
description: Before Salam at end of prayer
benefits: Seeking Allah's protection from major trials

zikr: أَسْتَغْفِرُ اللَّهَ، أَسْتَغْفِرُ اللَّهَ، أَسْتَغْفِرُ اللَّهَ، اللَّهُمَّ أَنْتَ السَّلَامُ وَمِنْكَ السَّلَامُ، تَبَارَكْتَ يَا ذَا الْجَلَالِ وَالْإِكْرَامِ
translation: I seek Allah's forgiveness (3 times). O Allah, You are Peace and from You comes peace. Blessed are You, O Owner of majesty and honor.
transliteration: Astaghfirullah (3x). Allahumma antas-salam wa minkas-salam, tabarakta ya dhal-jalali wal-ikram.
benefits: Seeking forgiveness and praising Allah

zikr: سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ، الْحَمْدُ للَّهِ، اللَّهُ أَكْبَرُ
translation: Glory be to Allah (33 times), All praise is for Allah (33 times), Allah is the Greatest (33 times).
transliteration: Subhan Allah (33x), Alhamdu lillah (33x), Allahu Akbar (33x).
benefits: Sins will be forgiven even if they are like the foam of the sea

zikr: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ، لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
translation: None has the right to be worshipped except Allah, alone, without partner, to Him belongs all sovereignty and praise, and He is over all things omnipotent.
transliteration: La ilaha illallahu wahdahu la sharika lah, lahul-mulku wa lahul-hamd, wa huwa 'ala kulli shay'in qadir.
benefits: Completion of 100 remembrances after prayer

zikr: اللَّهُ لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ الْحَيُّ الْقَيُّومُ ۚ لَا تَأْخُذُهُ سِنَةٌ وَلَا نَوْمٌ ۚ لَّهُ مَا فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَمَا فِي الْأَرْضِ ۗ مَن ذَا الَّذِي يَشْفَعُ عِندَهُ إِلَّا بِإِذْنِهِ ۚ يَعْلَمُ مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَمَا خَلْفَهُمْ ۖ وَلَا يُحِيطُونَ بِشَيْءٍ مِّنْ عِلْمِهِ إِلَّا بِمَا شَاءَ ۚ وَسِعَ كُرْسِيُّهُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ ۖ وَلَا يَئُودُهُ حِفْظُهُمَا ۚ وَهُوَ الْعَلِيُّ الْعَظِيمُ
translation: Allah - there is no deity except Him, the Ever-Living, the Sustainer of existence. Neither drowsiness overtakes Him nor sleep. To Him belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. Who is it that can intercede with Him except by His permission? He knows what is before them and what will be after them, and they encompass not a thing of His knowledge except for what He wills. His Kursi extends over the heavens and the earth, and their preservation tires Him not. And He is the Most High, the Most Great.
transliteration: Allahu la ilaha illa Huwa, Al-Hayyul-Qayyum. La ta'khudhuhu sinatun wa la nawm. Lahu ma fis-samawati wa ma fil-ard. Man dhalladhi yashfa'u 'indahu illa bi-idhnih. Ya'lamu ma bayna aydihim wa ma khalfahum, wa la yuhituna bi shai'im min 'ilmihi illa bima sha'. Wasi'a Kursiyyuhus-samawati wal-ard, wa la ya'uduhu hifdhuhuma, wa Huwal-'Aliyyul-'Azim.
description: Ayatul Kursi after each obligatory prayer
benefits: Nothing prevents entry into Paradise except death

zikr: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْتَخِيرُكَ بِعِلْمِكَ، وَأَسْتَقْدِرُكَ بِقُدْرَتِكَ، وَأَسْأَلُكَ مِنْ فَضْلِكَ الْعَظِيمِ، فَإِنَّكَ تَقْدِرُ وَلَا أَقْدِرُ، وَتَعْلَمُ وَلَا أَعْلَمُ، وَأَنْتَ عَلَّامُ الْغُيُوبِ، اللَّهُمَّ إِنْ كُنْتَ تَعْلَمُ أَنَّ هَذَا الْأَمْرَ خَيْرٌ لِي فِي دِينِي وَمَعَاشِي وَعَاقِبَةِ أَمْرِي فَاقْدُرْهُ لِي وَيَسِّرْهُ لِي ثُمَّ بَارِكْ لِي فِيهِ، وَإِنْ كُنْتَ تَعْلَمُ أَنَّ هَذَا الْأَمْرَ شَرٌّ لِي فِي دِينِي وَمَعَاشِي وَعَاقِبَةِ أَمْرِي فَاصْرِفْهُ عَنِّي وَاصْرِفْنِي عَنْهُ وَاقْدُرْ لِيَ الْخَيْرَ حَيْثُ كَانَ ثُمَّ أَرْضِنِي بِهِ
translation: O Allah, I seek Your guidance through Your knowledge, and I seek ability through Your power, and I ask You of Your great bounty. You have power; I have none. And You know; I know not. You are the Knower of hidden things. O Allah, if in Your knowledge this matter (mention your need) is good for me in my religion, my livelihood and my affairs, then ordain it for me, make it easy for me, and bless it for me. And if in Your knowledge it is bad for me and for my religion, my livelihood and my affairs, then turn it away from me, and turn me away from it. And ordain for me the good wherever it may be, and make me content with it.
transliteration: Allahumma inni astakhiruka bi'ilmika, wa astaqdiruka bi-qudratika, wa as'aluka min fadlikal-'azim, fa-innaka taqdiru wa la aqdir, wa ta'lamu wa la a'lam, wa anta 'allamul-ghuyub. Allahumma in kunta ta'lamu anna hadhal-amra khayrun li fi dini wa ma'ashi wa 'aqibati amri faqdurhu li wa yassirhu li thumma barik li fih, wa in kunta ta'lamu anna hadhal-amra sharrun li fi dini wa ma'ashi wa 'aqibati amri fasrifhu 'anni wasrifni 'anhu waqdur liyal-khayra haythu kana thumma ardini bih.
description: For seeking guidance in decision (pray 2 rakah then make this dua)
benefits: Seeking Allah's guidance in making important decisions

zikr: أَصْبَـحْنا وَأَصْبَـحَ المُـلْكُ لله وَالحَمدُ لله، لا إلهَ إلاّ اللّهُ وَحدَهُ لا شَريكَ لهُ، لهُ المُـلكُ ولهُ الحَمْـد، وهُوَ على كلّ شَيءٍ قدير، رَبِّ أسْـأَلُـكَ خَـيرَ ما في هـذا اليوم وَخَـيرَ ما بَعْـدَه، وَأَعـوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَـرِّ ما في هـذا اليوم وَشَرِّ ما بَعْـدَه، رَبِّ أَعـوذُبِكَ مِنَ الْكَسَـلِ وَسـوءِ الْكِـبَر، رَبِّ أَعـوذُ بِكَ مِنْ عَـذابٍ في النّـارِ وَعَـذابٍ في القَـبْر
translation: We have reached the morning and at this very time all sovereignty belongs to Allah. All praise is for Allah. There is no deity except Allah, the One. He has no partner. To Him belongs sovereignty and all praise. He has power over all things. O Lord, I ask You for the goodness within this day and the goodness after it and I take refuge in You from the evil within this day and the evil after it. O Lord, I take refuge in You from laziness and helplessness. O Lord, I take refuge in You from punishment in the Fire and punishment in the grave.
transliteration: Aṣbaḥnā wa aṣbaḥa-l-mulku li-llāh, wa-l-ḥamdu li-llāh. Lā ilāha illa-llāh waḥdahu lā sharīka lah. Lahu-l-mulku wa lahu-l-ḥamd, wa huwa ʿalā kulli shayʾin qadīr. Rabbi asʾaluka khayra mā fī hādhā-l-yawm wa khayra mā baʿdah, wa aʿūdhu bika min sharri mā fī hādhā-l-yawm wa sharri mā baʿdah. Rabbi aʿūdhu bika min al-kasali wa sūʾi-l-kibar. Rabbi aʿūdhu bika min ʿadhābin fī-n-nār wa ʿadhābin fī-l-qabr.
benefits: Protection from evil throughout the day

zikr: أَمْسَيْـنا وَأَمْسـى المـلكُ لله وَالحَمدُ لله، لا إلهَ إلاّ اللّهُ وَحدَهُ لا شَريكَ لهُ، لهُ المُـلكُ ولهُ الحَمْـد، وهُوَ على كلّ شَيءٍ قدير، رَبِّ أسْـأَلُـكَ خَـيرَ ما في هـذهِ اللَّـيْلَةِ وَخَـيرَ ما بَعْـدَهـا، وَأَعـوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَـرِّ ما في هـذهِ اللَّـيْلَةِ وَشَرِّ ما بَعْـدَهـا، رَبِّ أَعـوذُبِكَ مِنَ الْكَسَـلِ وَسـوءِ الْكِـبَر، رَبِّ أَعـوذُبِكَ مِنْ عَـذابٍ في النّـارِ وَعَـذابٍ في القَـبْر
translation: We have reached the evening and at this very time all sovereignty belongs to Allah. All praise is for Allah. There is no deity except Allah, the One. He has no partner. To Him belongs sovereignty and all praise. He has power over all things. O Lord, I ask You for the goodness within this night and the goodness after it and I take refuge in You from the evil within this night and the evil after it. O Lord, I take refuge in You from laziness and helplessness. O Lord, I take refuge in You from punishment in the Fire and punishment in the grave.
transliteration: Amsaynā wa amsā-l-mulku li-llāh, wa-l-ḥamdu li-llāh. Lā ilāha illa-llāh waḥdahu lā sharīka lah. Lahu-l-mulku wa lahu-l-ḥamd, wa huwa ʿalā kulli shayʾin qadīr. Rabbi asʾaluka khayra mā fī hādhihi-l-laylah wa khayra mā baʿdahā, wa aʿūdhu bika min sharri mā fī hādhihi-l-laylah wa sharri mā baʿdahā. Rabbi aʿūdhu bika min al-kasali wa sūʾi-l-kibar. Rabbi aʿūdhu bika min ʿadhābin fī-n-nār wa ʿadhābin fī-l-qabr.
benefits: Protection from evil throughout the night

zikr: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الَّذِي لَا يَضُرُّ مَعَ اسْمِهِ شَيْءٌ فِي الْأَرْضِ وَلَا فِي السَّمَاءِ وَهُوَ السَّمِيعُ الْعَلِيمُ
translation: In the Name of Allah with Whose Name there is protection against every kind of harm in the earth or in the heaven, and He is the All-Hearing and All-Knowing.
transliteration: Bismillahil-ladhi la yadurru ma'as-mihi shai'un fil-ardi wa la fis-sama'i, wa Huwas-Sami'ul-'Alim.
description: Protection dua - recite 3 times in morning
benefits: Nothing will harm the one who recites this 3 times

zikr: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الَّذِي لَا يَضُرُّ مَعَ اسْمِهِ شَيْءٌ فِي الْأَرْضِ وَلَا فِي السَّمَاءِ وَهُوَ السَّمِيعُ الْعَلِيمُ
translation: In the Name of Allah with Whose Name there is protection against every kind of harm in the earth or in the heaven, and He is the All-Hearing and All-Knowing.
transliteration: Bismillahil-ladhi la yadurru ma'as-mihi shai'un fil-ardi wa la fis-sama'i, wa Huwas-Sami'ul-'Alim.
description: Protection dua - recite 3 times in evening
benefits: Nothing will harm the one who recites this 3 times

zikr: رَضِيتُ بِاللَّهِ رَبًّا، وَبِالْإِسْلَامِ دِينًا، وَبِمُحَمَّدٍ نَبِيًّا
translation: I am pleased with Allah as my Lord, with Islam as my religion, and with Muhammad as my Prophet.
transliteration: Raditu billahi rabban, wa bil-islami dinan, wa bi-Muhammadin nabiyyan.
benefits: Paradise becomes obligatory for whoever says this 3 times

zikr: رَضِيتُ بِاللَّهِ رَبًّا، وَبِالْإِسْلَامِ دِينًا، وَبِمُحَمَّدٍ نَبِيًّا
translation: I am pleased with Allah as my Lord, with Islam as my religion, and with Muhammad as my Prophet.
transliteration: Raditu billahi rabban, wa bil-islami dinan, wa bi-Muhammadin nabiyyan.
benefits: Paradise becomes obligatory for whoever says this 3 times

zikr: سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ وَبِحَمْدِهِ
translation: Glory be to Allah and praise be to Him.
transliteration: Subhan Allah wa bihamdihi.
benefits: Sins forgiven even if like the foam of the sea

zikr: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ، لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
translation: None has the right to be worshipped except Allah, alone, without partner, to Him belongs all sovereignty and praise, and He is over all things omnipotent.
transliteration: La ilaha illallahu wahdahu la sharika lah, lahul-mulku wa lahul-hamd, wa huwa 'ala kulli shay'in qadir.
benefits: 10 good deeds, 10 sins erased, raised 10 degrees, protected from Shaytan

zikr: اللَّهُمَّ أَنْتَ رَبِّي لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ، خَلَقْتَنِي وَأَنَا عَبْدُكَ، وَأَنَا عَلَى عَهْدِكَ وَوَعْدِكَ مَا اسْتَطَعْتُ، أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا صَنَعْتُ، أَبُوءُ لَكَ بِنِعْمَتِكَ عَلَيَّ، وَأَبُوءُ بِذَنْبِي، فَاغْفِرْ لِي، فَإِنَّهُ لَا يَغْفِرُ الذُّنُوبَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ
translation: O Allah, You are my Lord. There is none worthy of worship besides You. You have created me and I am Your servant. I abide by Your covenant and promise to the best of my ability. I seek refuge in You from the evil I have done. I acknowledge Your bounties upon me, and I confess to my sins. Therefore, forgive me! Surely, none forgives sins except You.
transliteration: Allahumma anta rabbi la ilaha illa anta, khalaqtani wa ana 'abduka, wa ana 'ala 'ahdika wa wa'dika mastata'tu, a'udhu bika min sharri ma sana'tu, abu'u laka bi ni'matika 'alayya wa abu'u bi dhanbi, faghfir li fa innahu la yaghfirudh-dhunuba illa anta.
description: Sayyidul Istighfar - Master of Seeking Forgiveness
benefits: Whoever recites it morning/evening with firm faith and dies enters Paradise

zikr: بِاسْمِكَ اللَّهُمَّ أَمُوتُ وَأَحْيَا
translation: In Your name O Allah, I die and I live.
transliteration: Bismika Allahumma amutu wa ahya.
benefits: Acknowledging Allah's control over life and death

zikr: اللَّهُمَّ قِنِي عَذَابَكَ يَوْمَ تَبْعَثُ عِبَادَكَ
translation: O Allah, protect me from Your punishment on the Day You resurrect Your servants.
transliteration: Allahumma qini 'adhabaka yawma tab'athu 'ibadak.
description: When placing hand under cheek before sleep
benefits: Protection from punishment on Day of Judgment

zikr: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْلَمْتُ نَفْسِي إِلَيْكَ، وَفَوَّضْتُ أَمْرِي إِلَيْكَ، وَوَجَّهْتُ وَجْهِي إِلَيْكَ، وَأَلْجَأْتُ ظَهْرِي إِلَيْكَ، رَغْبَةً وَرَهْبَةً إِلَيْكَ، لَا مَلْجَأَ وَلَا مَنْجَا مِنْكَ إِلَّا إِلَيْكَ، آمَنْتُ بِكِتَابِكَ الَّذِي أَنْزَلْتَ، وَبِنَبِيِّكَ الَّذِي أَرْسَلْتَ
translation: O Allah, I submit myself to You, entrust my affairs to You, turn my face to You, and lay myself down depending upon You, hoping in You and fearing You. There is no refuge, nor escape, except to You. I believe in Your Book that You revealed, and Your Prophet whom You sent.
transliteration: Allahumma inni aslamtu nafsi ilayk, wa fawwadtu amri ilayk, wa wajjahtu wajhi ilayk, wa alja'tu zahri ilayk, raghbatan wa rahbatan ilayk, la malja'a wa la manja minka illa ilayk, amantu bikitabikal-ladhi anzalt, wa binabiyyikal-ladhi arsalt.
benefits: If you die that night, you die upon fitrah (natural state)

zikr: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ
translation: In the name of Allah.
transliteration: Bismillah.
benefits: Blessings in food and protection from harm

zikr: الْحَمْدُ للَّهِ الَّذِي أَطْعَمَنَا وَسَقَانَا، وَجَعَلَنَا مُسْلِمِينَ
translation: All praise is for Allah who fed us and gave us drink, and made us Muslims.
transliteration: Alhamdu lillahil-ladhi at'amana wa saqana, wa ja'alana muslimin.
benefits: Gratitude for sustenance and Islam

zikr: سُبْحَانَ الَّذِي سَخَّرَ لَنَا هَذَا وَمَا كُنَّا لَهُ مُقْرِنِينَ، وَإِنَّا إِلَى رَبِّنَا لَمُنْقَلِبُونَ
translation: Glory to Him who has subjected these to our use, for we could never have accomplished this by ourselves, and to our Lord, surely, we are to return.
transliteration: Subhana alladhi sakhkhara lana hadha wa ma kunna lahu muqrinin, wa inna ila rabbina lamunqalibun.
description: When boarding vehicle or beginning travel
benefits: Protection during travel

zikr: اللَّهُمَّ إِنَّا نَسْأَلُكَ فِي سَفَرِنَا هَذَا الْبِرَّ وَالتَّقْوَى، وَمِنَ الْعَمَلِ مَا تَرْضَى، اللَّهُمَّ هَوِّنْ عَلَيْنَا سَفَرَنَا هَذَا وَاطْوِ عَنَّا بُعْدَهُ، اللَّهُمَّ أَنْتَ الصَّاحِبُ فِي السَّفَرِ، وَالْخَلِيفَةُ فِي الْأَهْلِ، اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ وَعْثَاءِ السَّفَرِ، وَكَآبَةِ الْمَنْظَرِ، وَسُوءِ الْمُنْقَلَبِ فِي الْمَالِ وَالْأَهْلِ
translation: O Allah, we ask You in this journey of ours for righteousness and piety, and for deeds that are pleasing to You. O Allah, make this journey easy for us and make its distance short for us. O Allah, You are the Companion in the journey and the Successor over the family. O Allah, I seek refuge with You from the difficulties of travel, from having a change of heart and being in a bad predicament, and I take refuge in You from an ill fated outcome for wealth and family.
transliteration: Allahumma inna nas'aluka fi safarina hadhal-birra wat-taqwa, wa minal-'amali ma tarda. Allahumma hawwin 'alayna safarana hadha watwi 'anna bu'dah. Allahumma antas-sahibu fis-safar, wal-khalifatu fil-ahl. Allahumma inni a'udhu bika min wa'tha'is-safar, wa ka'abatil-manzar, wa su'il-munqalabi fil-mali wal-ahl.
benefits: Protection and ease during journey

zikr: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْهَمِّ وَالْحَزَنِ، وَالْعَجْزِ وَالْكَسَلِ، وَالْبُخْلِ وَالْجُبْنِ، وَضَلَعِ الدَّيْنِ وَغَلَبَةِ الرِّجَالِ
translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from anxiety and sorrow, weakness and laziness, miserliness and cowardice, the burden of debts and from being overpowered by men.
transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika min al-hammi wal-hazan, wal-'ajzi wal-kasal, wal-bukhli wal-jubn, wa dala'id-dayni wa ghalabatir-rijal.
benefits: Relief from worry, sadness, weakness and debts

zikr: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ سُبْحَانَكَ إِنِّي كُنْتُ مِنَ الظَّالِمِينَ
translation: There is no deity except You; exalted are You. Indeed, I have been of the wrongdoers.
transliteration: La ilaha illa anta subhanaka inni kuntu minaz-zalimin.
description: Dua of Prophet Yunus (AS) - for severe distress
benefits: No Muslim prays with it but Allah responds to him

zikr: يَا حَيُّ يَا قَيُّومُ بِرَحْمَتِكَ أَسْتَغِيثُ
translation: O Ever-Living, O Self-Sustaining, by Your mercy I seek help.
transliteration: Ya Hayyu Ya Qayyum bi-rahmatika astaghith.
description: For distress and seeking immediate relief
benefits: Help during difficult times

zikr: لَا بَأْسَ، طَهُورٌ إِنْ شَاءَ اللَّهُ
translation: Do not worry, it will be a purification (for you), Allah willing.
transliteration: La ba's, tahurun in sha' Allah.
benefits: Comforting the sick person

zikr: الْحَمْدُ للَّهِ
translation: All praise is for Allah.
transliteration: Alhamdu lillah.
description: What the one who sneezes says
benefits: Praising Allah

zikr: يَرْحَمُكَ اللَّهُ
translation: May Allah have mercy upon you.
transliteration: Yarhamukallah.
description: Reply to one who sneezes and praises Allah
benefits: Making dua for the sneezer

zikr: بَارَكَ اللَّهُ لَكَ، وَبَارَكَ عَلَيْكَ، وَجَمَعَ بَيْنَكُمَا فِي خَيْرٍ
translation: May Allah bless you, shower His blessings upon you, and unite you both in goodness.
transliteration: Baraka Allahu lak, wa baraka 'alayk, wa jama'a baynakuma fi khayr.
benefits: Blessing for the new couple

zikr: اللَّهُمَّ صَيِّباً نَافِعاً
translation: O Allah, (bring) beneficial rain clouds.
transliteration: Allahumma sayyiban nafi'an.
benefits: Asking for beneficial rain

zikr: مُطِرْنَا بِفَضْلِ اللَّهِ وَرَحْمَتِهِ
translation: It has rained by the bounty of Allah and His mercy.
transliteration: Mutirnabi fadlillahi wa rahmatihi.
benefits: Acknowledging Allah's mercy

zikr: سُبْحَانَ الَّذِي يُسَبِّحُ الرَّعْدُ بِحَمْدِهِ وَالْمَلَائِكَةُ مِنْ خِيفَتِهِ
translation: Glory be to Him whom thunder glorifies with His praise, and the angels too, out of fear of Him.
transliteration: Subhanal-ladhi yusabbihur-ra'du bi-hamdihi wal-mala'ikatu min khifatih.
benefits: Protection from lightning and thunder

zikr: إِنَّا لِلَّهِ وَإِنَّا إِلَيْهِ رَاجِعُونَ، اللَّهُمَّ أْجُرْنِي فِي مُصِيبَتِي وَأَخْلِفْ لِي خَيْرًا مِنْهَا
translation: Truly we belong to Allah, and truly to Him we shall return. O Allah, reward me in this affliction and replace it for me with something better.
transliteration: Inna lillahi wa inna ilayhi raji'un. Allahumma' jurni fi musibati wa akhlif li khayran minha.
description: Upon hearing of someone's death or facing calamity
benefits: Patience and divine compensation for loss

zikr: رَبَّنَا آتِنَا فِي الدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةً وَفِي الْآخِرَةِ حَسَنَةً وَقِنَا عَذَابَ النَّارِ
translation: Our Lord, give us in this world that which is good and in the Hereafter that which is good and protect us from the punishment of the Fire.
transliteration: Rabbana atina fid-dunya hasanatan wa fil-akhirati hasanatan wa qina 'adhaban-nar.
description: Comprehensive dua for this life and Hereafter
benefits: Most frequently recited dua by the Prophet ﷺ

zikr: قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ الْفَلَقِ، مِن شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ، وَمِن شَرِّ غَاسِقٍ إِذَا وَقَبَ، وَمِن شَرِّ النَّفَّاثَاتِ فِي الْعُقَدِ، وَمِن شَرِّ حَاسِدٍ إِذَا حَسَدَ
translation: Say: I seek refuge in the Lord of daybreak, from the evil of that which He created, and from the evil of darkness when it settles, and from the evil of the blowers in knots, and from the evil of an envier when he envies.
transliteration: Qul a'udhu bi-rabbil-falaq, min sharri ma khalaq, wa min sharri ghasiqin idha waqab, wa min sharrin-naffathati fil-'uqad, wa min sharri hasidin idha hasad.
description: Surah Al-Falaq - recite 3 times morning and evening
benefits: Protection from evil, magic, envy

zikr: قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ النَّاسِ، مَلِكِ النَّاسِ، إِلَٰهِ النَّاسِ، مِن شَرِّ الْوَسْوَاسِ الْخَنَّاسِ، الَّذِي يُوَسْوِسُ فِي صُدُورِ النَّاسِ، مِنَ الْجِنَّةِ وَالنَّاسِ
translation: Say: I seek refuge in the Lord of mankind, the Sovereign of mankind, the God of mankind, from the evil of the retreating whisperer who whispers into the hearts of mankind, from among the jinn and mankind.
transliteration: Qul a'udhu bi-rabbin-nas, malikin-nas, ilahin-nas, min sharril-waswasil-khannas, alladhi yuwaswisu fi sudurin-nas, minal-jinnati wan-nas.
description: Surah An-Nas - recite 3 times morning and evening
benefits: Protection from whispers of Shaytan

zikr: قُلْ هُوَ اللَّهُ أَحَدٌ، اللَّهُ الصَّمَدُ، لَمْ يَلِدْ وَلَمْ يُولَدْ، وَلَمْ يَكُن لَّهُ كُفُوًا أَحَدٌ
translation: Say: He is Allah, the One. Allah, the Eternal Refuge. He neither begets nor is born, nor is there to Him any equivalent.
transliteration: Qul huwa Allahu ahad, Allahu samad, lam yalid wa lam yulad, wa lam yakun lahu kufuwan ahad.
description: Surah Al-Ikhlas - recite 3 times morning and evening
benefits: Equivalent to one-third of the Quran

zikr: أَعُوذُ بِكَلِمَاتِ اللَّهِ التَّامَّاتِ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ
translation: I seek refuge in the perfect words of Allah from the evil of what He has created.
transliteration: A'udhu bi-kalimatillahit-tammati min sharri ma khalaq.
description: General protection from evil - recite 3 times
benefits: Nothing will harm him who says this 3 times in evening

zikr: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ وَعَلَى آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، كَمَا صَلَّيْتَ عَلَى إِبْرَاهِيمَ وَعَلَى آلِ إِبْرَاهِيمَ، إِنَّكَ حَمِيدٌ مَجِيدٌ، اللَّهُمَّ بَارِكْ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ وَعَلَى آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، كَمَا بَارَكْتَ عَلَى إِبْرَاهِيمَ وَعَلَى آلِ إِبْرَاهِيمَ، إِنَّكَ حَمِيدٌ مَجِيدٌ
translation: O Allah, send prayers upon Muhammad and upon the family of Muhammad, as You sent prayers upon Ibrahim and the family of Ibrahim; You are indeed Worthy of Praise, Full of Glory. O Allah, send blessings upon Muhammad and upon the family of Muhammad as You sent blessings upon Ibrahim and the family of Ibrahim; You are indeed Worthy of Praise, Full of Glory.
transliteration: Allahumma salli 'ala Muhammadin wa 'ala ali Muhammadin, kama sallayta 'ala Ibrahima wa 'ala ali Ibrahima, innaka Hamidun Majid. Allahumma barik 'ala Muhammadin wa 'ala ali Muhammadin, kama barakta 'ala Ibrahima wa 'ala ali Ibrahima, innaka Hamidun Majid.
description: Durood Ibrahim - the most complete form of Salawat taught by the Prophet ﷺ
benefits: This is the salawat recited in every prayer. The Prophet ﷺ taught this when companions asked how to send blessings upon him

zikr: مَنْ صَلَّى عَلَيَّ صَلَاةً وَاحِدَةً صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ عَشْرَ صَلَوَاتٍ وَحُطَّتْ عَنْهُ عَشْرُ خَطِيئَاتٍ وَرُفِعَتْ لَهُ عَشْرُ دَرَجَاتٍ
translation: Whoever sends salah (blessings) upon me once, Allah will send salah upon him tenfold, and will erase ten sins from him, and will raise him ten degrees in status.
transliteration: Man salla 'alayya salatan wahidatan salla Allahu 'alayhi 'ashara salawatin wa huttat 'anhu 'ashr khati'atin wa rufi'at lahu 'ashr darajat.
description: The immense reward for sending one salawat upon the Prophet ﷺ
benefits: For each salawat: Allah sends 10 blessings, 10 sins erased, elevated 10 degrees. Authenticated as Sahih

zikr: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ
translation: O Allah, send prayers upon Muhammad.
transliteration: Allahumma salli 'ala Muhammad.
description: The shortest and simplest form of sending blessings upon the Prophet ﷺ
benefits: Quick to recite, can be said frequently throughout the day. Fulfills the command in Quran 33:56

zikr: قُلْتُ يَا رَسُولَ اللَّهِ أَرَأَيْتَ إِنْ جَعَلْتُ صَلاَتِي كُلَّهَا عَلَيْكَ قَالَ إِذًا تُكْفَى هَمَّكَ وَيُغْفَرُ لَكَ ذَنْبُكَ
translation: I (Ubayy ibn Ka'b) said: O Messenger of Allah, what if I make all of my supplication for sending blessings upon you? He said: Then your concerns will be taken care of and your sins will be forgiven.
transliteration: Qultu ya Rasula Allah ara'ayta in ja'altu salati kullaha 'alayka qala idhan tukfa hammaka wa yughfar laka dhanbuk.
reference: Sunan at-Tirmidhi 2457, authenticated as Hasan by at-Tirmidhi and Sahih by al-Albani
description: The virtue of dedicating one's supplications to sending blessings on the Prophet ﷺ
benefits: Allah will take care of all worldly and afterlife concerns and forgive sins. Authenticated as Sahih by Sheikh al-Albani

zikr: أَوْلَى النَّاسِ بِي يَوْمَ الْقِيَامَةِ أَكْثَرُهُمْ عَلَيَّ صَلاَةً
translation: The closest of people to me on the Day of Resurrection will be those who send the most blessings upon me.
transliteration: Awla an-nasi bi yawma al-qiyamati aktharuhum 'alayya salatan.
reference: Sunan at-Tirmidhi 484, authenticated as Hasan by at-Tirmidhi
description: The Prophet ﷺ describing who will be closest to him on the Day of Judgment
benefits: Closeness to the Prophet ﷺ on the Day of Resurrection by frequently sending salawat

zikr: الدُّعَاءُ مَوْقُوفٌ بَيْنَ السَّمَاءِ وَالأَرْضِ لاَ يَصْعَدُ مِنْهُ شَيْءٌ حَتَّى تُصَلِّيَ عَلَى نَبِيِّكَ
translation: The supplication is suspended between heaven and earth, and none of it ascends until you send blessings upon your Prophet.
transliteration: Ad-du'a mawqufun bayna as-sama'i wal-ardi la yas'adu minhu shay'un hatta tusalliya 'ala nabiyyik.
reference: Sunan at-Tirmidhi 486, authenticated as Hasan by al-Albani
description: Statement of Umar ibn al-Khattab (may Allah be pleased with him) about salawat before dua
benefits: Sending salawat on the Prophet ﷺ before making dua helps the dua to be accepted

zikr: إِذَا دَعَا أَحَدُكُمْ فَلْيَبْدَأْ بِتَحْمِيدِ اللَّهِ وَالثَّنَاءِ عَلَيْهِ ثُمَّ لْيُصَلِّ عَلَى النَّبِيِّ ثُمَّ لْيَدْعُ بَمَا شَاءَ
translation: When any one of you prays, let him begin by praising Allah and extolling Him, then let him send blessings upon the Prophet, then let him ask for whatever he wants.
transliteration: Idha da'a ahadukum falyabda' bi-tahmidi Allahi wa ath-thana'i 'alayhi thumma li-yusalli 'ala an-nabiyyi thumma li-yad'u bima sha'.
reference: Sunan at-Tirmidhi 3477, Sunan Abi Dawud 1481, authenticated as Sahih by al-Albani
description: The proper order of making dua: praise Allah, send salawat, then ask
benefits: Following this order makes the dua more likely to be accepted

zikr: صَلُّوا عَلَيَّ فَإِنَّ صَلاَتَكُمْ عَلَيَّ زَكَاةٌ لَكُمْ
translation: Send blessings upon me, for indeed your blessings upon me are purification for you.
transliteration: Sallu 'alayya fa-inna salatakum 'alayya zakatun lakum.
description: The purifying effect of sending salawat upon the Prophet ﷺ
benefits: Sending salawat purifies the soul and increases spiritual rank

zikr: أَكْثِرُوا الصَّلاَةَ عَلَيَّ يَوْمَ الْجُمُعَةِ وَلَيْلَةَ الْجُمُعَةِ فَمَنْ صَلَّى عَلَيَّ صَلاَةً صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ عَشْرًا
translation: Send blessings upon me abundantly on Friday and the night of Friday, for whoever sends blessings upon me once, Allah will send blessings upon him ten times.
transliteration: Akthiru as-salata 'alayya yawma al-jumu'ati wa laylata al-jumu'ati fa-man salla 'alayya salatan salla Allahu 'alayhi 'ashran.
reference: Sunan al-Bayhaqi, authenticated as Hasan by al-Albani in Sahih al-Jami 1209
description: The special emphasis on sending abundant salawat on Friday
benefits: Multiplied reward on Friday. Allah sends 10 blessings for each salawat sent on the Prophet ﷺ
